statements: SELECT * FROM DiscriminationCases;
SELECT case_id, case_date, complainant_name FROM DiscriminationCases ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT case_location, discrimination_type FROM DiscriminationCases WHERE discrimination_type = 'Gender';
SELECT * FROM DiscriminationCases WHERE case_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT case_id, allegations FROM DiscriminationCases WHERE case_location = 'New York' ORDER BY case_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM DiscriminationCases WHERE case_id = 100;
SELECT case_id, case_date, discrimination_type FROM DiscriminationCases WHERE case_location = 'New York';
SELECT MAX(case_date) AS latest_case_date, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM DiscriminationCases;
SELECT complainant_name, allegations FROM DiscriminationCases WHERE discrimination_type = 'Gender Discrimination' AND case_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT discrimination_type FROM DiscriminationCases ORDER BY discrimination_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM discrimination_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_date FROM discrimination_cases ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT issue_name, issue_description FROM human_rights_issues WHERE issue_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM discrimination_cases WHERE case_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT issue_id, issue_name, issue_description FROM human_rights_issues ORDER BY issue_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM discrimination_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_date FROM discrimination_cases ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM human_rights_issues WHERE issue_name LIKE 'Discrimination%';
SELECT issue_name, issue_description FROM human_rights_issues WHERE issue_id > 5;
SELECT issue_name, issue_description FROM human_rights_issues ORDER BY issue_id LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM DiscriminationCases;
SELECT case_id, case_description, primary_race FROM DiscriminationCases WHERE primary_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM DiscriminationReports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, reporter_name FROM DiscriminationReports WHERE case_id = 1001;
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, violation_date FROM RightsViolationStats ORDER BY violation_date ASC, violation_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM DiscriminationCases WHERE primary_race = 'Black' AND primary_gender = 'Female';
SELECT case_id, case_date, primary_race FROM DiscriminationCases WHERE case_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM DiscriminationReports JOIN DiscriminationCases ON DiscriminationReports.case_id = DiscriminationCases.case_id WHERE reporter_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT report_date, report_description FROM DiscriminationReports WHERE report_date >= '2021-06-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT case_id, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM DiscriminationReports GROUP BY case_id HAVING num_reports > 5;
SELECT * FROM Discrimination_Cases;
SELECT case_id, case_description, date_reported FROM Discrimination_Cases;
SELECT location, case_description FROM Discrimination_Cases WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM Victims WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT perpetrator_name, perpetrator_details FROM Perpetrators ORDER BY perpetrator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Discrimination_Cases;
SELECT case_id, location, date_reported FROM Discrimination_Cases WHERE location='New York';
SELECT victim_name, gender FROM Victims WHERE victim_age > 30 ORDER BY victim_name ASC;
SELECT perpetrator_name, perpetrator_details FROM Perpetrators WHERE case_id = 3;
SELECT report_id, reporter_name, report_date FROM Reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM discrimination_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM discrimination_cases;
SELECT party_name, party_type, case_id FROM case_parties ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, country FROM case_locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT statistic_name, statistic_value FROM case_statistics WHERE statistic_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM discrimination_cases;
SELECT case_name, reported_date FROM discrimination_cases WHERE reported_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT party_name, party_type, location_name, country FROM case_parties INNER JOIN case_locations ON case_parties.case_id = case_locations.case_id;
SELECT case_name, outcome_description FROM discrimination_cases LEFT JOIN case_outcomes ON discrimination_cases.case_id = case_outcomes.case_id;
SELECT MAX(statistic_value) AS max_statistic_value, AVG(statistic_value) AS avg_statistic_value FROM case_statistics;
